```go
make() function to initialize the slice:
```

```go
func main() { 
   months := make([]string, 6) 
   ... 
} 

make() does the followings:
```

```go
func main() { 
   months := make([]string, 6, 12)  
   ... 
} 

months variable with a slice value with an initial length of 6 and a maximum capacity of 12.
```
